Bachelor's Thesis

Institution: TU Berlin
Completion: October 2024
Topic: Generative models in security testing and transformer-based fuzzing frameworks

Investigated the application of modern machine learning techniques to automated security testing, with emphasis on transformer architectures for enhanced fuzzing effectiveness.
